name: BPSS - Bowser x Peach mod
description:
This is a mod of the original Beast and Pepper game to replace them with Bowser and Peach.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Use this link to download the original game https://bpss.itch.io/bpss
  • unzip that game and locate the MODS folder.
  • Download my mod from here and place it in the MODS folder (unzipped).
  • Start the BPSS exe

The game will automatically load your mod after about 10 seconds.

Be sure to visit the original creator on patreon for more info and support. His constant updates are what makes this mod possible.
https://www.patreon.com/BP_SS
